FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure DS-3 parameters. DS-3 lines provide a speed of 44.736 Mb/s and is also frequently used by service providers. DS-3 lines carry 28 DS-1 signals and a 44.736 Mb/s data rate.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the components making up the specified SONET/SDH Path. Depending on the type of SONET/SDH port the sonet-sdh-index must specify more path indexes to specify the payload location of the path. The sonet-sdh-index differs for SONET and SDH ports.
